trim.if: AND (t.region LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR t.id_no LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR t.mobile LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR t.car_brand LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%")

mapper.select:
SELECT t.code ,t.repay_biz_code ,t.loan_product_code ,t.loan_product_name ,t.region ,t.loan_bank

,t.gua_mobile ,t.gua_id_no ,t.gua_phone ,t.gua_company_name ,t.gua_company_address ,t.gua_house_asset_address
,t.gua_zfb_jour_datetime_start ,t.gua_zfb_jour_datetime_end ,t.gua_zfb_jour_interest ,t.gua_zfb_interest1 ,t.gua_zfb_interest2 ,t.gua_zfb_jour_income ,t.gua_zfb_jour_expend ,t.gua_zfb_jour_balance ,t.gua_zfb_jour_month_income ,t.gua_zfb_jour_month_expend ,t.gua_zfb_jour_pic ,t.gua_zfb_jour_remark

,t.jour_datetime_start ,t.jour_datetime_end ,t.jour_interest ,t.interest1 ,t.interest2 ,t.jour_income ,t.jour_expend ,t.jour_balance ,t.jour_month_income ,t.jour_month_expend ,t.jour_pic ,t.jour_remark ,t.asset_pdf
,t.house_contract ,t.house_picture ,t.hk_book_pdf ,t.id_card_pdf ,t.marry_pdf ,t.other_pdf ,t.is_advance_fund ,t.bank_video ,t.bank_photo ,t.company_video ,t.company_contract ,t.bank_contract ,t.other_video ,t.interview_other_pdf
,t.advance_fund_datetime ,t.advance_fund_amount ,t.bill_pdf ,t.advance_fund_amount_pdf ,t.car_settle_datetime
,t.car_number ,t.car_invoice ,t.car_jqx ,t.car_syx ,t.policy_datetime ,t.policy_due_date ,t.car_regcerti
,t.car_pd ,t.car_key ,t.car_big_smj ,t.bank_commit_datetime ,t.bank_commit_note
,t.bank_fk_datetime ,t.repay_bank_code ,t.repay_bank_name ,t.repay_subbranch ,t.repay_bankcard_number
,t.repay_bill_date ,t.repay_bank_date ,t.repay_company_date ,t.repay_first_month_amount ,t.repay_first_month_datetime
,t.repay_month_amount ,t.receipt_bank_code ,t.receipt_bank_name ,t.receipt_bankcard_number ,t.receipt_pdf
,t.receipt_remark ,t.pledge_user ,t.pledge_address ,t.pledge_datetime ,t.green_big_smj ,t.pledge_bank_commit_datetime ,t.pledge_bank_commit_note
,t.enter_location ,t.sale_user_id ,t.team_code ,t.company_code ,t.apply_datetime ,t.back_advance_status
,t.back_advance_amount ,t.back_advance_account ,t.back_advance_open_bank ,t.back_advance_subbranch ,t.back_advance_water_bill
,t.cur_node_code ,t.cancel_node_code ,t.frozen_status ,t.remark FROM tdq_budget_order t
t.${order}

SELECT t.code ,t.repay_biz_code ,t.loan_product_code ,t.loan_product_name ,t.region ,t.loan_bank
,t.gps_fee ,t.auth_fee ,t.bank_fee ,t.company_fee ,t.team_fee ,t.credit_code
,t.biz_type ,t.loan_period ,t.invoice_company ,t.car_brand ,t.car_series ,t.car_model ,t.car_type ,t.car_pic ,t.car_hgz_pic ,t.drive_license_front ,t.drive_license_reverse ,t.evaluate_column ,t.car_frame_no ,t.car_engine_no ,t.original_price
,t.invoice_price ,t.car_color ,t.month_deposit ,t.first_amount ,t.first_rate
,t.loan_amount ,t.settle_address ,t.apply_user_id ,t.apply_user_name ,t.gender ,t.age
,t.id_kind ,t.id_no ,t.mobile ,t.car_number ,t.car_invoice
,t.repay_bank_code ,t.repay_bank_name ,t.repay_subbranch ,t.repay_bankcard_number ,t.repay_bill_date
,t.repay_bank_date ,t.repay_company_date ,t.repay_first_month_amount ,t.repay_first_month_datetime ,t.repay_month_amount
,t.bank_fk_datetime ,t.is_advance_fund ,t.sale_user_id ,t.company_code ,t.apply_datetime
,t.cur_node_code ,t.remark ,t.team_code ,t.back_advance_status ,t.frozen_status FROM tdq_budget_order t
t.${order}

,t.car_pd ,t.car_key ,t.car_big_smj ,t.bank_commit_datetime ,t.bank_commit_note
,t.bank_fk_datetime ,t.repay_bank_code ,t.repay_bank_name ,t.repay_subbranch ,t.repay_bankcard_number
,t.repay_bill_date ,t.repay_bank_date ,t.repay_company_date ,t.repay_first_month_amount ,t.repay_first_month_datetime
,t.repay_month_amount ,t.receipt_bank_code ,t.receipt_bank_name ,t.receipt_bankcard_number ,t.receipt_pdf
,t.receipt_remark ,t.pledge_user ,t.pledge_address ,t.pledge_datetime ,t.green_big_smj ,t.pledge_bank_commit_datetime ,t.pledge_bank_commit_note
,t.enter_location ,t.sale_user_id ,t.team_code ,t.company_code ,t.apply_datetime ,t.back_advance_status
,t.back_advance_amount ,t.back_advance_account ,t.back_advance_open_bank ,t.back_advance_subbranch ,t.back_advance_water_bill
,t.cur_node_code ,t.cancel_node_code ,t.frozen_status ,t.remark FROM tdq_budget_order t left join tsys_role_node trn on t.cur_node_code = trn.node_code
t.${order}
SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT distinct code FROM tdq_budget_order t left join tsys_role_node trn on t.cur_node_code = trn.node_code ) tb

SELECT distinct t.code ,t.apply_user_name ,t.loan_bank ,t.loan_amount ,t.company_code ,t.sale_user_id ,t.advance_fund_datetime ,t.cur_node_code FROM tdq_budget_order t where t.cur_node_code between '002_09' and '002_14'
t.${order}

SELECT t.code ,t.credit_code ,t.original_price ,t.sale_user_id ,t.apply_user_name ,t.id_no ,t.loan_period ,t.car_brand ,t.loan_amount ,t.repay_first_month_amount ,t.repay_month_amount ,t.repay_bankcard_number ,t.repay_bank_date ,t.biz_type FROM tdq_budget_order t
t.${order}
